00001 <?php
00009 abstract class POMTemplateParameter extends POMDcbElement
00010 {
00011         public static function &parse($text)
00012         {
00013 
00014                 $pair = split('=', $text, 2);
00015 
00016                 # if it's a name/value pair, create POMTemplateNamedParameter, otherwise, create POMTemplateNumberedParameter
00017                 # if neither can be created, return POMTemplateInvalidParameter
00018                 if (count($pair) > 1)
00019                 {
00020                         $name = $pair[0];
00021                         $value = $pair[1];
00022 
00023                         $name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00024 
00025                         if (strlen($name_triple->trimmed)<=0)
00026                         {
00027                                 # ignore parameters with empty name
00028                                 return new POMTemplateInvalidParameter($text);
00029                         }
00030 
00031                         return new POMTemplateNamedParameter($name, $value);
00032                 }
00033                 else
00034                 {
00035                         return new POMTemplateNumberedParameter($text);
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 }

00045 class POMTemplateNamedParameter extends POMTemplateParameter
00046 {
00052         public $name_triple;
00058         public $value_triple;
00059 
00066         public function __construct($name, $value)
00067         {
00068                 $this->name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00069                 $this->value_triple = new POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple($value);
00070 //              $this->nodeText = $this->toString();
00071                 
00072                 $this->id = "namedParameter".POMElement::$elementCounter;
00073                 POMElement::$elementCounter++;
00074         }
00075 
00084         public function update($name, $value, $override_name_spacing = false, $override_value_spacing = false)
00085         {
00086                 $name_triple = new POMUtilTrimTriple($name);
00087                 $value_triple = new POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple($value);
00088 
00089                 if ($override_name_spacing)
00090                 {
00091                         $this->name_triple = $name_triple;
00092                 }
00093                 else
00094                 {
00095                         $this->name_triple->trimmed = $name_triple->trimmed;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 if ($override_value_spacing)
00099                 {
00100                         $this->value_triple = $value_triple;
00101                 }
00102                 else
00103                 {
00104                         $this->value_triple->trimmed = $value_triple->trimmed;
00105                 }
00106         }
00107 
00113         public function getName()
00114         {
00115                 return $this->name_triple->trimmed;
00116         }
00122         public function getValue()
00123         {
00124                 return $this->value_triple->trimmed;
00125         }
00126 
00132         public function &getValueByReference()
00133         {
00134                 return $this->value_triple->trimmed;
00135         }

00161         public function toString()
00162         {
